Group hierarchy: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.

With the increased budget I have added more number of web servers, app servers for redundecy as well as better DB servers with more provisioned IOPS and SSD space. I also added increased CloudFront distribution in another nearby region as well as web, app and DB stack for redundancy across regions. Also CloudFront distrubution is configured for more data with more outbound capacity.
